TEXT.TITLE: FIRST INTERSTATE <I> RAISES PRIME RATE
TEXT.BODY: The First Interstate Bank of California subsidiary of First Interstate Bancorp said it is raising its prime lending rate to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2 pct, effective immediately. Reuter
